ygData.subject: Re: tradeskills
ygData.msgSnippet: To restate it, Alcohol does increase STR and stamina, but you have to be quite tolerant of it before this becomes useful.
ygData.messageBody:
To restate it, Alcohol does increase STR and stamina, but you have to be
quite tolerant of it before this becomes useful.

"Sianne ." wrote:
>
> From: "Sianne ." <maggee1@...>
>
> Thanx Sirensa, thats what i thought....i didn't like the garbed up speach
> anyway, lol
>
> Sianne
>
> >From: "Sirensa Qi'Seraph" <Sirensa@...>
> >Reply-To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
> >To: <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
> >Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] tradeskills
> >Date: Wed, 20 Oct 1999 12:22:39 -0700
> >
> >In my experience drinking alcohol does not add to strength as I had heard
> >it
> >would (maybe some warriors, etc - but not clerics that I have seen) - and
> >you wouldn't want to drink while hunting because it makes you interrupt on
> >your casting times. It will not affect your wisdom, but the more you drink
> >the more your intelligence will drop. It is a pretty useless skill for a
> >cleric and more for fun and roleplay, in my opinion.
> >
> >~Siren
> ><< text3.html >>
>
>
